Founder of the Maitraka Dynasty

During the decline of the Gupta Empire, Bhatarka (who was a commander of the Guptas) established an independent Maitraka dynasty in Saurashtra (Gujarat).

ЁЯП░
Capital: Vallabhi

He made 'Vallabhi' his capital, which later became a great center of education and trade.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Title: Senapati (He did not assume the title of king, maintaining nominal loyalty to the Guptas).
  • Administration: Military-based administration (Maitraka also means sun and is associated with the Mihira/Mitra tribe).
